Class BookingSystem

  • java.lang.Object
    • MOBLIMA.BookingSystem
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    MOBLIMASystem
    public class BookingSystem
extends java.lang.Object
implements MOBLIMASystem
    Represents a controller system which keeps track of the bookings.
    Since:
    2019-11-13
    Version:
    1.0
    Author:
    SS1 Group 2

      • BookingSystem

        public BookingSystem()
        Constructor for the system. It attempts to deserialize the database file. If file does not exist, it will reset the database.
